Description: Two fragments of a funerary papyrus containing Second Book of Breathing (incomplete version) written in hieratic script.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: See Herbin, Books of breathing and related texts (2008), 143. Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, p. 106, pls. 70-71.
Bibliographic references: Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (p.106, pls. 70-71)
